name: 楊重光
objective: 配合化學課程之進展，教導學生學習各項基本實驗操作及儀器設備之技巧，進行各項實驗課程，如COD 的測定，氮莫耳體積之測定，錯合物之生成，氧化還原滴定，蒸汽壓，測量溶解度，反應速率，化學平衡，耐綸-6,6之製備以訓練學生養成手腦並用的務實科學素養。
schedule:
1-3 weeks, lab rules and safety training
4th  week, chemical kinetics experiment
5th week, dissolution experiment
6th week, ionic strength and dissolution
8th week, the synthesis of complex chemicals
9th week, mid term examination
10th week, chemical equilibrium experiment
11th week, electrochemistry lab
12th week, surfactant and its synthesis
13th week, the fabrication of detergents
14th week, the synthesis of nylon 6-6
15th-17th lab reports
18th week, final examination
scorePolicy:
實作測試
實驗報告
